record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if the Senator will yield for a unanimous consent request?

Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that upon the completion of the statement by the Senator from Ohio, I be recognized, and that upon the completion of my statement, I believe the Senator from Texas, Mr. Cornyn, wishes to be recognized.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I thank the senior Senator from Vermont for his courtesy.
